name: Souperior Invader
description:
You waking up in the start of alien invasion and finding out that they HATE tomatoes and peas (and tin cans). Take your guns and show them from what are you made of!

Pistol - small but powerfull and accurate gun. Uses tomato ammo.

Shotgun - powerful short-range weapon that can deal massive damage to your enemies. Uses pea ammo.

Uzi - medium-range rapid-fire weapon, that quite inaccurate sometimes, but can help you if your life is in danger. Uses tomato ammo.

Can Cannon - big, powerful and accurate weapon that can penetrate thru hundreds of enemies. Fires cans instead of tomato or peas.

WASD - Movement

LMB - Shoot

1, 2, 3, 4 or Mouse Whell - Change weapons

P - Pause
